bibl.title: Hy]ψ[ipyle. A Version for the Stage.
bibl.note: Text prepared for presentation to the annual conference of the Classical Association at Royal Holloway, University of London (RHUL), on 12 September 1997. Performance took place in the studio theatre of the Department of Drama, Theatre and Media Arts.

bibl.title: Lost Dramas of Classical Athens. Greek Tragic Fragments

bibl.seg: WILES David, Hy]ψ[ipyle. A Version for the Stage.
Fiona McHARDY, James ROBSON and David HARVEY (Edd.), Lost Dramas of Classical Athens. Greek Tragic Fragments (Exeter, 2005) pp. 189-207.

Text prepared for presentation to the annual conference of the Classical Association at Royal Holloway, University of London (RHUL), on 12 September 1997. Performance took place in the studio theatre of the Department of Drama, Theatre and Media Arts.
